Posted By: Vedalken_Arbiter (4/15/2010 10:46:16 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Awesome card, at least in limited, though I wouldn't be surprised if shes constructed playable. I had her solo an opponents to 0 turn five of a prerelease, and since the only cards supporting her then were whatever limited auras I could find, its pretty damned impressive.  
  
This isn't just a ridiculous god hand, this is what happened:  
T1: Land  
T2: Land, Spiritdancer  
T3: Hyena Umbra x 2 (swing for 6)  
T4: Distortion Strike (swing for 7 unblockable)  
T5: Distortion Strike rebounds (swings for 7 unblockable: 20 damage total)  
  
Drawing a card+totem armor turn auras from card disadvantage to advantage, which is just awesome.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
If this card can play at early stage, all Aura come later will be very good.
  
But the problem is : The deck need keep many Aura cards.
  
Once get all aura cards in hand without any creature, will see the weakness of this card.
  
May be this is the reason why Stoneforge Mystic is much expensive than this.
  
No need keep that much equipment cards in the deck.
